body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for calling Baker's Delight. My name is Thomas Thompson. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, I'm Deborah Coleman. I'm having some issues with the security of my account, and I feel quite nervous about it.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear you're feeling this way, Deborah. Let's see what we can do to address the issue. Can you please provide me with your email address associated with your account?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Deborah. For authentication purposes, can you also provide me with the last four digits of your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, the last four digits are one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it, thank you. It looks like there was an attempt to log into your account from an unfamiliar device. We've blocked this attempt and reset your password as a precaution.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Oh, that makes sense. I was worried someone might have accessed my account.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Don't worry, Deborah. Your account is safe now. We've sent you an email with instructions to reset your password. Follow those steps, and you should be all set.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you so much for your help, Thomas. I feel much better now.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Deborah. Thank you for your time, and feel free to contact us if you need any further assistance. Have a great day!
